EmailTemplate.subject: Going to the FCAM 2012 Professional Development Seminar Feb. 7-9?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Fire Chiefs Association of Massachusetts 2012 Professional Development Seminar February 7-9, 2012 l Boxborough, Massachusetts
Stop by for a visit at the FCAM 2012 Professional Development Seminar on February 7-9 and find out why TriTech is the largest public safety solution provider in America with more than 2,600 clients.
If you would like to pre-schedule a demonstration of our CAD, Mobile Data, Civil Process, Corrections or Records Management solutions, please call or email us today.
Dennis Noe, Regional Sales Manager Phone: 774-551-9114 Dennis.Noe@TriTech.com
David Bell, Customer Account Manager Phone: 774-551-9104 David.Bell@TriTech.com
Hope to see you there! Check out the latest TriTech news here
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121
